author: lightclient
content: tldr from eip-1559 call: general consensus seems to be that eip-2718 makes sense to bundle w/ 1559. Their main concern is its potential to delay 1559. So as long as we can get 2718 accepted and scheduled for a hard fork before or inline with 1559 it should work out

author: lightclient
content: I'll introduce 2718 this week at ACD and will update with their initial thoughts

author: lightclient
content: i'd also like to know if anyone knows how eip-232 was received and why it was never accepted, as it is very similar to 2718
